tasks.dev: deno task db:start && deno run --env --watch -A ./src/index.ts api
tasks.serve: deno task db:start && deno run -A --env ./src/index.ts api
tasks.migrate: deno task db:start && deno run -A --env ./src/index.ts migrate
tasks.seed: deno task db:start && deno run -A --env ./src/index.ts seed
tasks.generate: deno task db:start && deno task drizzle-kit generate
tasks.studio: deno task db:start && deno task drizzle-kit studio
tasks.check: deno lint && deno task drizzle-kit check
tasks.initialize: deno task db:start && deno install && deno task migrate && deno task seed
tasks.test:e2e: deno task dev & deno task test
